response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors and elevate your projects to new heights. Given its exceptional value and the impact it can have on your work, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This special offer reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs and surpass your expectations. I look forward to hearing your response and the opportunity to contribute to your success.", "product_price": 9500}
